name: Blaze Audio Wave Information File
summary: Learn about .BAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BAP files take up little space, but significantly increase the processing speed of the program. They are saved in the same location as the audio files they represent. While BAP files store information about audio files, they do not contain any actual audio data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
